import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { StarIcon } from '@heroicons/react/20/solid'; import FavoriteButton from './FavoriteButton'; export default function BabysitterCard({ babysitter }) { return (
{babysitter.name?.[0] || '?'}

{babysitter.name}

{babysitter.rating || 0} ({babysitter.totalReviews || 0} reviews)

{babysitter.bio || 'No bio available'}

${babysitter.tarif || 0}/hr {babysitter.experience || 0} years exp.
{babysitter.competances?.length > 0 && (
{babysitter.competances.map((skill, index) => ( {skill} ))}
)} View Profile
); }
